title: Free Bicycle Storage, 24-Hour Fitness Center with Free Weights
posting_body: Welcome to Carlisle on the Park!

If you are looking for some of the most versatile, pet-friendly apartments for rent Capitol Hill, Denver has to offer with a prime location in a highly walkable neighborhood, you have come to the right place - Carlisle on the Park.
Our recently remodeled one- and two-bedroom apartments provide a spacious layout to call your own.
With features like two-tone paint, a full appliance package, crown molding, and mirrored closet doors, our homes find the right balance of comfort and style.
You will appreciate community conveniences that include on-site laundry facilities, a fitness center, and off-street reserved parking.
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 488 Sq.
- Updated Kitchens with Full Suite of Appliances including Dishwasher & Disposal
- On-Site Management with Courtesy Package Acceptance, and 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance
- Pet-Friendly Community Located Steps from Cheesman Park
- Three Roof-Top Lounges with Sundecks and Stunning Views of Denver
- Off-Street Reserved Parking & Optional Covered Parking Available
- Private Courtyards with BBQ Grills, Lounge Areas, & Water Features
We love your pets and are excited to welcome them to their new home!
We allow two pets per apartment home with a combined weight not exceed 160 lbs.
Cats and dogs are welcome at our community although some breed restrictions apply.
